main event: A round, red object with a white top was observed in Forrestville, Ohio on December 21, 1955.
interesting points: The object was observed for 25 minutes without any sound,It was reported as flying at a very slow speed and very high altitude,The observation was made using 12 by 52 glasses,The observer was experienced in visual monitoring,The report concludes there is insufficient data to determine the object's disappearance and motion.
sighted object: round, red object with a white top
